news.title: Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers: Third Quarter 2022
news.description: We’re back with another edition of Justia Ask A Lawyer by the Numbers, a series where we’re offering you a glimpse at the usage statistics for consumers and lawyers on our free question-and-answer forum!

news.title: Justia Free Resources: Aviation Law Center
news.description: You probably don’t think twice before hopping on a plane for a vacation or a work event. But not every flight is smooth. The Aviation Law Center at Justia discusses many of the rules that may apply when something goes wrong.
